Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: TUF GAMING B650M-E WIFI
Part Number: 90MB1FV0-M0AAY0


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: AM5
CPU Type: Ryzen 7000 Series / Ryzen 8000 Series / Ryzen 9000 Series


Chipsets
Chipset: AMD B650


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 7600+(OC)/ 7200(OC)/ 7000(OC)/ 6800(OC)/ 6600(OC)/ 6400(OC)/ / 6200(OC)/ 6000(OC)/ 5800(OC)/ 5600(OC)/ 5400(OC)/ 5200/ 5000/ 4800
Maximum Memory Supported: 192GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel
ECC Supported: ECC and Non-ECC, Un-buffered Memory
Buffer Supported: Un-buffered


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 4.0 x16: AMD Ryzen 9000 & 7000 Series Desktop Processors*
1 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slot (supports x16 mode)

AMD Ryzen 8000 Series Desktop Processors
1 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slot (supports x8/x4 mode)**
PCI Express x1: AMD B650 Chipset
2 x PCIe 4.0 x1 slots


Storage Devices
Serial ATA (SATA): 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: AMD Ryzen 9000 & 7000 Series Desktop Processors
M.2_1 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 5.0 x4 mode)
M.2_2 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)

AMD Ryzen 8000 Series Desktop Processors
M.2_1 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)
M.2_2 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4/x2 mode)**

AMD B650 Chipset
4 x SATA 6Gb/s ports

* AMD RAIDXpert2 Technology supports both PCIe RAID 0/1/10 and SATA RAID 0/1/10.
** Specifications vary by CPU types.
SATA RAID: * AMD RAIDXpert2 Technology supports both PCIe RAID 0/1/10 and SATA RAID 0/1/10.


Onboard Audio
Audio Channels: Realtek 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio CODEC*
- Supports: Jack-detection, Multi-streaming, Front Panel Jack-retasking
- Supports up to 24-Bit/192 kHz playback"
Audio Features
- Audio Shielding
- Premium audio capacitors
- Dedicated audio PCB layers
* A chassis with an HD audio module in the front panel is required to support 7.1 Surround Sound audio output.


Onboard LAN
Max LAN Speed: 1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet
TUF LANGuard
Wireless LAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 ax
Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.2


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (10G) ports (1 x Type-A + 1 x USB Type-C)
2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5G) ports (2 x Type-A)
4 x USB 2.0 ports (4 x Type-A)
2 x DisplayPort
1 x HDMI port
1 x Wi-Fi Module
1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet port
3 x Audio jacks
1 x BIOS FlashBack button
1 x PS/2 Keyboard/Mouse combo port


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5G) connector (supports USB Type-C)
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5G) header supports 2 additional USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports
2 x USB 2.0 headers support 4 additional USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan and Cooling related
1 x 4-pin CPU Fan header
1 x 4-pin CPU OPT Fan header
1 x 4-pin AIO Pump header
2 x 4-pin Chassis Fan headers
